issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
If a TableView has a search bar in it, then docking or undocking the Android tablet with its physical keyboard causes a crash when that view is visible (but not with a range of other view components).

Test case attached (reliable crash), with error message (which, since the USB debugging connection runs through the keyboard, could only be captured for the docking and not undocking crash -- but the crash looks the same on the screen either way).
fields.summary: Android dock/undock crashes Titanium when searchbar present in TableView
fields.environment:
Host platform: Mac OS X 10.8.5
Titanium Studio, build: 3.1.3.201309132423
Asus Transformer Prime TF201, Android 4.1.1
